32  /// <inheritdoc/>

34  /// Interaction logic for App.xaml
35  /// </summary>
36  public partial class App : Application
37  {
38  #region Protected Methods
39 
40  /// <summary>
41  /// What do we during the OnStartup event for the application.
42  /// </summary>
43  /// <param name="e">event argument(s)</param>
44  protected override void OnStartup(StartupEventArgs e)
45  {
46  // Let the base appliation do what it needs to do
47  base.OnStartup(e);
48 
49  // Setup the IoC
50  IoC.Setup();
51 
52  //Show the main window
53  Current.MainWindow = new MainWindow();
54  Current.MainWindow.Show();
55  }
56 
57  #endregion Protected Methods
58  }
59 }
